creator: pogo_tomcat@yahoo.com
text:
Even at the highest log verbosity, Jasper does not appear to emit a log message
that corresponds to the act of compilation.  It would be useful for debugging
and analysis to see this information output in a log, presumably at the
INFORMATION log level.
There is a debug level message in all currently supported Tomcat versions (5.5.x+) that logs the file name and the time taken to compile it.
creator: markt@apache.org
